channel.title: Whenever i do a command
channel.description:
anytime i do a command ingame i get an error in my runserver.bat and i get disconnected ingame. even though i get no errors int he compiler. i think it is possibly the saving methods i added to the source for my bank pins considering i just added those and then i started to get the problem. so this is the problem i get :
GolemXScape ... Is Now Online! owner golemx is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: -1 at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source) at client.customCommand(client.java:13693) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:27600) at client.packetProcess(client.java:21797) at client.packetSending(client.java:21750) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153) at server.main(server.java:51) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception Game saved for player owner golemx ClientHandler: Client owner golemx disconnected. Connection accepted from 127.0.0.1: 63599. Client type: high memory version
the error happened after i typed ::home. i know that it works with all commands because i tryed like 10...
please tell me what i can do?

item.title: Whenever i do a command
item.dc:creator: @OGolemX OGolemX
item.description:
@OGolemX wrote:

anytime i do a command ingame i get an error in my runserver.bat and i get disconnected ingame. even though i get no errors int he compiler. i think it is possibly the saving methods i added to the source for my bank pins considering i just added those and then i started to get the problem. so this is the problem i get :

    GolemXScape
 ... Is Now Online!

owner golemx is signing onto server.
LOADED: 3
java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: -1
at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source)
at client.customCommand(client.java:13693)
at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:27600)
at client.packetProcess(client.java:21797)
at client.packetSending(client.java:21750)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153)
at server.main(server.java:51)
pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception
Game saved for player owner golemx
ClientHandler: Client owner golemx disconnected.
Connection accepted from 127.0.0.1: 63599.
Client type: high memory version

the error happened after i typed ::home.
i know that it works with all commands because i tryed like 10â€¦

please tell me what i can do?
